text: Explore the submerged palace and secrets buried by the sea

title: Mission Description
content: That day, a grand ship, laden with glory and five hundred heroes, set sail from Styxia and plunged into the embrace of towering waves shrouded in mist. Days later, the ocean fell silent, and for a thousand years, no wave rose again.No one knows the story hidden in mist and waves. Perhaps, only the ocean remembers —A single burning ambition ignited all the timbers laden on that ship. Ashes of emptiness drifted slowly to the ocean floor.Go now, and feel that chilling flame, and those burning tears.

text: Reunite with... heroes of the past?
Witness the sacrifice of two heroes
Go forth, to the bloodstained deep sea
Go forth, to the buried yesterday
Alter space and time, witness the truth
Listen to the conversation between Hysilens and Cerydra
Alter space and time, find the entrance to the vortex
Go forth, into the deeper abyss
Go forth, to the silent graves

title: Step Description
content: Just as one clutches the flame of hope, traversing through the twilight of their destined life until they reach their grave.Just as you, embracing your hope, have arrived at time's end in fulfillment.Go now. Farewell. By the temple lies a heaven-made sanctuary.

text: Commemorate the first Flame-Chase Journey with honey brew
Commemorate the second Flame-Chase Journey with honey brew
Go forth, to the ethereal song
Go forth, to her who is waiting for you
Go forth, into the deeper abyss
